title: Astronautilus needs a new back
body: I feel that since astronautilus is a 1350 RP skin, it should have a new recall. I know that his walking animation changed significantly, but still having the original recall doesn't make it worthy of being a 1350 RP skin. The new blood moon skins have a different recall and they are only 975 Rp. Please add a new backing animation for astronautilus!

replies.body:
I agree.

If a skin is 1350 RP it should definitely include a new recall.
I would really love if he would have a recall where he does something with floating around.
